text: I started niveau low in Seattle about
five years ago and our focus is all
mobile we do an experience that can work
in the browser on any smartphone we are
basically a one-stop shop for people
that are trying to do marketing and
reach people on their smartphones I've
been using virtual machines for about
seven or eight years now so that was
kind of like a baby step towards cloud
computing what's really changed is the
ability to have kind of like an easy
bake oven for building a server the
ability to watch your traffic load watch
a live show from New York City that's
running on your servers on Amazon and
realized that the traffic is going out
of your projections and add another
server in real time it's astounding you
couldn't do that with any other tool
joining the Bismarck program allowed me
to commit my company to the technology
without having to commit so much budget
just turned everything to Lightspeed
it's just it's been fantastic
when you dig into it and you explore a
little bit more you realize there's so
many benefits to cloud computing it's
kind of revolutionary it just changes
the way you approach things and it
changes the speed that with which you
can respond to market opportunities the
services we use on amazon web services
to implement our architecture are
instances on ec2 we also have block
storage and we also use the route 53
name servers the more you know about
cloud computing in a way the better it
is and the more you like it cost savings
are clear at this point my metrics say
that my server costs are one third of
the cost of a dedicated host for four
times the serving power that I have my
hosting machines one of the recent
campaigns we did was for Jake old and
racing which is a national level
professional road racing team we put
this entire campaign together including
t-shirts sandwich boards QR codes and
the mobile website and the text
messaging campaign and I think seven
days from the moment we first talked to
this guy being able to count on the
technology and count on that on the
server is absolutely important well
that's an understatement it's life and
death for us we have to go to rely on it
being able to have Amazon Web Services
behind us is fantastic what it really
comes down to his ability to walk into a
sales meeting and to tell somebody I can
scale to the moon I can get as big as
you need me to get that's a great thing
to be able to walk into a sales meeting
have that confidence knowing that we've
got amazon behind us
you
